name: Car Dealer (Dealership) and Vehicle sales
author: Bill Minozzi

sections.description:
CAR DEALER
â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…

Car Dealers can manage, list and sell cars and vehicles online quickly. The plugin provides option for include (no quantity limit) and manage car fields names.
.
The pro version enhances the plugin with complete real time visual template design functionality, providing you with the ability to customize its design, including the colors. With the real-time preview panel on the right, you can instantly visualize the changes you make and see how they affect the overall appearance of the site. This feature empowers you to create a tailored and visually appealing design that perfectly aligns with your preferences.
.
You don’t need another plugin or extension (neither coding) to complete the job.
Responsive, light and very easy to install and manage. StartUp guide online available at plugin settings page.

Create Your Own Fields:

Online Customizer with Live Preview:

You can find the:

  • demo page here
  • demo video here
  • visual customizer demo video here
  • online guide here
  • support page here
  • Free Car Dealer Theme page here
  • Download Demo Data Here
  • FAQ Page here
  • Plugin Site
  • Share ðŸ™‚
  • Add your own featured fields/equipments (no limit)
  • Really built for Car Dealership business not for Car Classified Websites
  • Range Slider for Price
  • Multilingual Support
  • English, Danish, Dutch, French, Germany, Hungarian, Italian, Portugues, Polish, Serbian, Spanish Files Included
  • Contact Me for translate to another language
  • Easily Customize Search Options (up to 7 fields to filter)
  • Currency Manager
  • 3 Widgets (Search, Featured and Recent cars)
  • Option for thumbnails with ratio 4:3 or 2:1
  • Multiple dealerships locations
  • Flexslider gallery integrated (optional)
  • Call to Action Contact Form
  • Gallery, List View or Grid Template for Show Room Page
  • 4 templates for Single Car Page (one with Sidebar)
  • Summary for the most important data, when mouse on car image (gallery)
  • Team Page Included.

If you are a car dealer and need sell another product (not cars), like, for example,
Planes, Trucks, Motorcycles, Scooters, Campers, RVs, Motorhome,
Travel Trailer, Trailers, Lifts, Tractor, Forklift & Lift Truck,
Snowmobile, MotoSnow, Snow Motorcycle, Motorbike Motor Full,
and even Aircrafts, Jets Aircrafts, Helicopters, Turboprops, Charter,
Airplanes, Aerotrader AirPlanes, Articulated Trucks, Dozers, raglines,
Drills, Electric Rope Shovels, Excavators, Loaders.
Industrial Machinery, Diesel driven air compressor,
Eletric Power Generator,
take a look in our free Multi Dealer Plugin

If you sell boats, take a look in our free plugin:
Boat Dealer Plugin

If you a Real Estate Agency, take a look in our plugin:
Real Estate Plugin

This plugin was tested and work fine with this themes:

  • WordPress Oficial Themes
  • For Dummies (free)
  • Vertical Menu (free)
  • Kar Dealer (free)

OTHERS IMAGES CREDIT

Some Icons made by www.freepik.com
Royalty free photos www.pixabay.com

External Service

The Car Dealer plugin will retrieve tips and news from our site BillMinozzi.com. This information will be displayed in the plugin dashboard, in the right-hand column under the title “Tips and News.” No data is sent to our server.

These are the terms of use for our plugins.
sections.installation:
1) Install Car Dealer via wordpress.org
2) Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
or
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
How to Install?
1) Install Car Dealer via wordpress.org
2) Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
or
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
Where is the OnLine Manual?
https://cardealerplugin.com/guide/
Where is the OnLine FAQ page?
https://cardealerplugin.com/faq/
Where is the Demo page?
https://cardealerplugin.com/demo/
How can i get support?
https://cardealerplugin.com/contact/
Can i translate to my language right away?
Yes. Please, contact me about that.
Start from this file cardealer.pot at /wp-content/plugins/cardealer/language

What are the core plugins and themes for car dealerships on WordPress?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: wordpress car dealer plugin, car dealer plugin kit, elementor car dealer, car dealer elementor, car dealer showcase, car dealership wordpress plugin, vehicle dealership wordpress plugin, automotive wordpress plugin, car listing plugin for wordpress, used car dealership wordpress, new car dealership wordpress, vehicle management wordpress, wordpress car dealer theme, cardealer theme, car inventory plugin, car listing plugin, customizable car dealership wordpress plugin

Our “Car Dealer” plugin and the free “Kar Dealer Theme” offers a comprehensive suite of core plugins and themes specifically designed for car dealerships on WordPress.

How can I manage and market my car dealership effectively?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: car dealer management, car dealer marketing, car dealer manager, car dealer pro, car dealer tools, easy car dealer, vehicle seller, car merchant, car dealer 2022, car-seller, car distributor, brokers

The “Car Dealer” plugin provides powerful management and marketing tools to help you efficiently run and promote your car dealership.

What solutions are available for automobile dealership and sales?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: automobile dealership, automotive dealer, car lot, auto showroom, car retailer, vehicle seller, car sales, car inventory, add cars

Our “Car Dealer” plugin offers comprehensive solutions for automobile dealership and sales, ensuring smooth operations and increased sales.

How can I design and build a car dealer website?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: car dealer website builder, car dealer website design, wordpress themes for car dealers, free car dealership wordpress theme

With the “Car Dealer” plugin, you can easily design and build a professional car dealer website using our intuitive tools and themes.

What are the best SEO and marketing tools for car dealers?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: car dealer seo plugin, best wordpress plugin for car dealers

The “Car Dealer” plugin includes top-notch SEO and marketing tools to enhance your online presence and attract more customers.

How can I manage vehicle financing and CRM needs?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: vehicle financing calculator plugin, vehicle sales crm wordpress

Our “Car Dealer” plugin provides solutions for vehicle financing and CRM needs, helping you manage customer relationships and sales processes efficiently.

What options are available for car dealer marketplace and listings?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: car dealer marketplace, car listings, #car dealer

Our “Car Dealer” plugin offers robust options for managing a car dealer marketplace and listings, making it easy to showcase your inventory.

How can I find guides and resources for creating a car dealership website?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: how to create a car dealership website, how to build a car dealership website with wordpress

The “Car Dealer” plugin provides comprehensive guides and resources to help you create a car dealership website with ease.

What WordPress plugins are available for specific car dealership functions?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: wordpress plugin for car inventory, wordpress plugin to sell cars online

The “Car Dealer” plugin includes specialized WordPress plugins for specific car dealership functions, such as managing inventory and selling cars online.

How can I manage car brokerage, design with Elementor, handle appointments, and manage inventory on WordPress?

This FAQ page also addresses the following questions: car broker, elementor car dealer, wordpress, wordpress car dealer inventory plugin

Our “Car Dealer” plugin provides comprehensive solutions for managing car brokerage, designing with Elementor, handling appointments, and managing inventory on WordPress, ensuring a seamless and efficient workflow for your dealership.
